overview:
As CFO, Mr. Head has responsibility for all financial/accounting, HR/Personnel, Legal, Risk Management, Treasury and General Administrative functions.

Prior to joining Frontstream, Head was Chief Financial Officer for Valutec Card Solutions, the premier gift/loyalty program provider to the small merchant market. Previously, Head served in a variety of financial management roles with Nu-kote International, (international manufacturer/distributor); Thomas Nelson, Inc. (international publisher); Rogers Group, Inc. (regional construction firm); and Pinkerton Tobacco Company (international manufacturer/marketer).

Head holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Applied Mathematics from Brescia University and an MBA from Murray State University. He also is a Certified Management Accountant.
